title: Sales, Community & Student Retention Manager
job_overview:
About Us:
We are a start-up international community dedicated to teaching Kabbalistic astrology in a practical, spiritual, and accessible way. We offer courses in multiple languages and work with students from all over the world. Our mission is to deliver high-impact programs and services that empower our communities and clients.

Are you a motivated, relationship-driven professional who’s passionate about education and thrives under pressure? We're looking for a Sales & Student Retention Manager to join our growing team. You’ll play a key role in driving student enrollment, boosting retention, and organizing impactful workshops—all while navigating a fast-paced environment with multiple active projects.

???? What You’ll Be Doing:

Sales & Lead Management
– Respond to incoming leads via phone, WhatsApp, and email
– Conduct personalized consultations with prospective students
– Recommend course offerings based on individual needs and goals

Student Retention & Engagement
– Build and maintain strong relationships with current and former students
– Encourage re-enrollment and long-term satisfaction
– Provide timely support to ensure a positive learning experience

Organizing Workshops & Collaborations
– Plan and coordinate workshops, events, and collaboration opportunities for alumni
– Strengthen community engagement and promote lifelong learning

Data & Performance Tracking
– Monitor and analyze sales performance, conversion rates, and campaign effectiveness
– Use data to identify opportunities for improvement and growth

Marketing & CRM Coordination
– Manage leads and follow-ups through CRM tools (Tilda, HubSpot, or similar)
– Support optimization of digital funnels and promotional campaigns

???? You’re a Great Fit If You:
Are fluent in English (bonus: Russian or Spanish)
Have strong sales and customer service skills
Are experienced with CRM tools like Tilda or HubSpot
Are highly organized, detail-oriented, and thrive under pressure
Can juggle multiple tasks and deadlines in a fast-moving environment
Communicate clearly and build strong relationships with diverse audiences
Are excited to support students and contribute to meaningful educational experiences
